title: Darius changes on PBE

embed.description: Hey all, Now that everyone's favorite dunkmaster has hit the PBE, wanted to make a consolidated thread where we can discuss the design direction and talk about potential tweaks we can make before he hits the Live servers. Notes Some of Darius' early lane power has been shifted more tow

body:
Hello all,

Darius is one of my favorite champions in league so I've been watching the changes that are currently on the PBE. Also I've read  the discussion on surrender@20 and the PBE boards so I would like to share my thoughts on one aspect I didn't like.

Darius E Apprehend
"Fixed a bug where enemies would be pulled in if they escaped the area during the cast time"

This statement  is about when champions use an escape but still get pulled (I think) which I reckon should remain because that is one reasons I like Darius as it's fun to pull off and master plus they have removed the movement speed bonus from his passive so I think this "bug" is necessary due to Darius being even more immobile than before so he should have some stickiness to compensate for this weakness. While the have changed the passive to deal physical damage and the interaction with black cleaver I still do not think it is enough and I personally would prefer this over the slow on E (PBE) or even nerfs to other parts of his kit.

They where also talking about champion identity and how every champion should feel different from each other and when I think of Darius, this is part of his identity and how he operates especially the "Juggernaut" theme as Darius will be slow but will have some form of CC to keep people in the fight. 

Everything else seems okay or even good to me, what are your thoughts on his rework?

replies.body: The new Darius changes already make it so he can literally 3 hit anyone and build full-tank. Stop being greedy.

His bugged e is on the same tier as invisible nid spears. 
As for his identity, I see him as an executioner and his team mates are like wardens. They hold the enemy down then he delivers a swift death.

so you're bug abusing scum?
being immobile is part of what makes darius darius. if he had mobility, he would be a monster. you'd be able to walk up to the enemy backline and just delete their carries. and that would be fucking bullshit.
So a very glaring bug is something that should remain? laggy gameplay (what his apprehend is) isnt wanted.
